languages.text: Где-то в системе Райкад находится Хейнрикс ван Каллокс — дознаватель Инквизиции. Его привело сюда некое дело крайней важности. Вольному Торговцу, как верн{mf|ому|ой} слуге Империума, надлежит разыскать дознавателя и оказать ему поддержку. Но сделать это может быть не так просто.

A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.
languages.original_text: Где-то в системе Райкад находится Хейнрикс ван Каллокс — дознаватель Инквизиции. Его привело сюда некое дело крайней важности. Вольному Торговцу, как верн{mf|ому|ой} слуге Империума, надлежит разыскать дознавателя и оказать ему поддержку. Но сделать это может быть не так просто.

traits.locale_text: A matter of utter importance has led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, named Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad system. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant to the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it might be easier said than done.

A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

languages.text: Eine Angelegenheit von höchster Wichtigkeit führte Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator der Inquisition, ins Rykad-System. Die Pflicht {mf|des Freihändlers als treuer Diener|der Freihändlerin als treue Dienerin} des Imperiums besteht darin, den Interrogator zu finden und ihn bei seiner Mission zu unterstützen. Da sein Aufenthaltsort derzeit unbekannt ist, könnte das leichter gesagt als getan sein.
languages.original_text: A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

traits.locale_text: Eine Angelegenheit von höchster Wichtigkeit führte Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator der Inquisition, ins Rykad-System. Die Pflicht {mf|des Freihändlers als treuer Diener|der Freihändlerin als treue Dienerin} des Imperiums besteht darin, den Interrogator zu finden und ihn bei seiner Mission zu unterstützen. Da sein Aufenthaltsort derzeit unbekannt ist, könnte das leichter gesagt als getan sein.

languages.text: Une affaire de la plus haute importance a poussé l'interrogateur de l'Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, à se rendre dans le système de Rykad. En tant que fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Imperium, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se doit de trouver l'interrogateur et de l'assister dans sa mission. Mais puisque sa position actuelle est un mystère, cela risque d'être plus facile à dire qu'à faire.
languages.original_text: A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

traits.locale_text: Une affaire de la plus haute importance a poussé l'interrogateur de l'Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, à se rendre dans le système de Rykad. En tant que fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Imperium, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se doit de trouver l'interrogateur et de l'assister dans sa mission. Mais puisque sa position actuelle est un mystère, cela risque d'être plus facile à dire qu'à faire.

languages.text: 由于发生了某件极其重要的事情，审判庭的海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯审讯官去了莱卡德星系。身为帝国忠诚的仆人，行商浪人的职责是找到那位审讯官，并协助他完成任务。由于此人目前行踪不明，这个任务或许比听起来要更加棘手。
languages.original_text: A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

traits.locale_text: 由于发生了某件极其重要的事情，审判庭的海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯审讯官去了莱卡德星系。身为帝国忠诚的仆人，行商浪人的职责是找到那位审讯官，并协助他完成任务。由于此人目前行踪不明，这个任务或许比听起来要更加棘手。

languages.text: 極めて重要な問題により、異端審問庁のインテロゲイターであるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスがライカド星系に向かった。帝国の忠実な従者として、自由開拓者はインテロゲイターを見つけ出してその任務を助けなければならない。彼の現在の所在が不明であることを考えると、口で言うほど簡単なことではないだろう。
languages.original_text: A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

traits.locale_text: 極めて重要な問題により、異端審問庁のインテロゲイターであるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスがライカド星系に向かった。帝国の忠実な従者として、自由開拓者はインテロゲイターを見つけ出してその任務を助けなければならない。彼の現在の所在が不明であることを考えると、口で言うほど簡単なことではないだろう。

languages.text: Un asunto de vital importancia ha traído al Interrogador de la Inquisición Heinrix van Calox al sistema Rykad. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente, como fiel sirviente del Imperium, debe encontrar al Interrogador y ayudarle en la misión. Para ello, un buen primer paso sería encontrar al Interrogador y descubrir qué está haciendo.
languages.original_text: A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

traits.locale_text: Un asunto de vital importancia ha traído al Interrogador de la Inquisición Heinrix van Calox al sistema Rykad. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente, como fiel sirviente del Imperium, debe encontrar al Interrogador y ayudarle en la misión. Para ello, un buen primer paso sería encontrar al Interrogador y descubrir qué está haciendo.

languages.text: Büyük önem arz eden bir mesele, Engizisyon Sorgucusu Heinrix van Calox'u Rykad Sistemi'ne getirmiş. İmparatorluk'un sadık bir hizmetkârı olarak Hür Tacir'in vazifesi de onu bulup görevine destek olmak. Ancak Sorgucunun tam yeri henüz bilinmediğinden, sanıldığından daha zor bir iş olacak.
languages.original_text: A matter of the utmost importance led the Interrogator of the Inquisition, Heinrix van Calox, to the Rykad System. The Rogue Trader's duty as a loyal servant of the Imperium is to find the Interrogator and aid him in his mission. Since his whereabouts are currently unknown, it may be easier said than done.

traits.locale_text: Büyük önem arz eden bir mesele, Engizisyon Sorgucusu Heinrix van Calox'u Rykad Sistemi'ne getirmiş. İmparatorluk'un sadık bir hizmetkârı olarak Hür Tacir'in vazifesi de onu bulup görevine destek olmak. Ancak Sorgucunun tam yeri henüz bilinmediğinden, sanıldığından daha zor bir iş olacak.
